itemDescription: English telegraph company employee, alpinist and man of letters (1824-1902)

wikipedia_page.main: Henry Schütz Wilson (15 September 1824 – 7 May 1902) was an English writer and literary critic, and mountaineer.

response: The firm was continued by his son Henry Schütz Wilson, before being taken over by Isaac Pitman in 1932 which was taken over in turn by Pearson plc.
